title: fragment:the-old-wiki-02
content:
[[module CSS]]
#page-title {
  display: none;
}

.meta-title {
  border-bottom: solid 1px #bbbbbb;
  color: #990011;
  font-weight: normal;
  margin: 0 0 0.6em;
  padding: 0 0 0.25em;
  font-size: 200%;
}

.meta-title p {
  margin: 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-jp-sandbox2:inc:addspecialcss]]
[[include :scpsandboxcn:inc:addspecialcss-cn]]
[[div class="DummyForumTitle"]]
[[[the-old-wiki|旧维基]]] / 讨论区
* Forum
* 单页讨论 / 单页讨论
* 旧维基
[[/div]]

[[include :scpsandboxcn:inc:pseudosummary |
URL=http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/cynthia7979/blank.png|
NAME=Wikidot |
DATE=12 Sep 2008, 00:44|
POST=3|
SUMMARY = block]]
这是与维基页面相关联的讨论内容 [[[the-old-wiki|旧维基]]].
[[include :scpsandboxcn:inc:pseudosummary-end]]

[[include :scp-jp-sandbox2:inc:pseudoPost |
URL=http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/cynthia7979/Kain%20Pathos%20Crow.png|
NAME=Kain Pathos Crow |
DATE=12 Sep 2008, 00:45|
TITLE= ]]
但是进化那些东西太牛了！冲啊！
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-jp-sandbox2:inc:pseudoPost |
URL=http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/cynthia7979/Dr%20Gears.png|
NAME=Dr Gears |
DATE=12 Sep 2008, 00:51|
TITLE= ]]
芜湖！我们就像某种奇怪的网络蝴蝶一样，冲出了旧网站的茧，比以前变得更好，更强了!
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-jp-sandbox2:inc:pseudoPost |
URL=http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/cynthia7979/Noaqiyeum.png|
NAME=Noaqiyeum |
DATE=12 Sep 2008, 06:07|
TITLE= ]]
一只奇怪的网络蝴蝶，险些被黑暗未知的恐怖吞噬……
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="DummyNew-post"]]
[[span class="fake-link"]]新文章[[/span]]

author: Cynthia7979
